column2: Papa Bear, Alpha Black here. We are grinding the enemy down and have captured Dearsum. Over.
Alpha to Papa Bear. We've captured the smoking wreckage of the airbase. At least the runway is intact. Over.
Papabear, this is Alpha. We've discovered what appears to be captured US weapons in a Red storage area in one of the Airbase hangars. Over.
Roger that, Alpha. Take what you need and leave the rest for our logistics group. Papabear out.
Roger that, Alpha. Make sure your men are kept topped off with ammo. Papa Bear out.
Alpha. Papa Bear here. Ten-to-one odds paid off. Not that we were actually betting real money. Good work. out.
Alpha, your mission is accomplished. Papa Bear out.
